title: Tea Bowl and Saucer
artistDisplayName: Marked by Matthäus Baur II (active Augsburg [now Germany], 1681–1728)
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Purchased with funds provided by The Antiquarian Society; Pauline Seipp Armstrong and Charles R. and Janice Feldstein endowments; through prior acquisitions of Mrs. Josephine P.
